## getPrice() function

Retrieves a Stripe price from the database.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getPrice(payments: StripePayments, productId: string, priceId: string): Promise<Price>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  payments | [StripePayments](./firestore-stripe-payments.stripepayments.md) | A valid [StripePayments](./firestore-stripe-payments.stripepayments.md) object. |
|  productId | string | ID of the product to which the price belongs. |
|  priceId | string | ID of the price to retrieve. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Price](./firestore-stripe-payments.price.md)<!-- -->&gt;

Resolves with a Stripe Price object if found. Rejects if the specified product ID or the price ID does not exist.
